Novato.Skywalker Ranch: Skywalker Ranch is a movie ranch and workplace of film director, writer and producer George Lucas located in a secluded, yet open area near Nicasio, California, in Marin County. The ranch is located on Lucas Valley Road, named for an early 20th century landowner in the area, no relation to George Lucas. The Ranch is not open to the public and keeps a low profile from the road.
